outputs.output_descr:
The initial plan is for development of a full sized Project (FSP) on *Promoting -Climate-Resilient  Development And Enhanced Adaptive  Capacity  to Withstand Disaster  Risks In Angolan's Cuvelai River Basin *. The main  project components include:(i) A detailed review  of existing  climate change risks information  and analysis at the national  basin-wide and provincial  level, including  any current  and projected changes in climatic parametres, exposure and vulnerability to floods and drought',(II)Review  analysis and summary of all current  and past revelant project activities by the government in the province and nationality and their linkages to this project and (III) Assessment and detailed analysis of all proposed interventions  in the PIF and their expected impacts, as well as recommendations  on the optimal implementation structure 
 for achievement of the desire project outcomes.

project_descr: Promoting Climate -Resilient  Development and Enhanced Adaptive Capacity to Withstand Disaster Risks in Angolan's Cuvelai River Basin
